general.gigTitle: build, redesign, revamp wordpress website development, ecommerce website design

sellerCard.description:
My name is Arju Akter, a certified Web Developer with over 6+ years of experience. 

Expert in WordPress | WooCommerce | Elementor | Divi | Wix | Squarespace | Shopify | Custom CSS and other CMS platforms.

Also, I'm managing a strong and experienced team with multiple departments. I am committed to delivering high-quality work results at an affordable price.

I'm always on top of project communication and updates. Just let me know what task you need help with, and I will get to it; no time wasted. I look forward to working with you! Thanks

description.content:
Are you looking for a professional web developer who can design, redesign, build, copy, clone, create, fix or revamp wordpress website? 


Great! You are in the right place.


I specialize in providing top-quality stunning and fully functional WordPress design and redesign services that captivate your audience and boost your online presence.


I can help you to design a professional responsive website from scratch or redesign an existing WordPress site to the next level.


I can create a variety of websites, including:


  • Portfolio Website
  • Sales/One Page/Landing Page
  • News, Government, Magzine, Business site
  • Real Estate/Realtors
  • Online Store (WooCommerce)
  • School/College/University
  • Travel, Wedding, Writers, Books
  • Doctors, Athletes, Sports, Health & Fitness
  • Hotel Booking, LMS site, Appointment, etc.


You will get more benefits, including:


  • After Sales Support
  • Free Consultation
  • Listed Premium Tools
  • Video Tutorial for Modifying/Editing
  • 100% Satisfaction Or Money-Back
  • 24/7 Fast and Friendly Communication


Any concerns or questions regarding hiring? 


Please click the Contact Me button and let's discuss your requirements so that we can accurately fulfill what you are willing to do.

reviews.comment:
Exceptional Service and Results Beyond Expectations

Working with this incredibly professional team was truly an outstanding experience. From the moment I started, I had a vague idea of what I wanted, but the final website they delivered exceeded anything I could have imagined. Hossain, in particular, had the vision to bring my concept to life in a way I couldn't have envisioned on my own. He instinctively understood exactly what I needed, even when I wasn’t sure where to begin.

What truly set this team apart was their unwavering patience, understanding, and commitment. They stayed dedicated throughout the entire process, showing incredible perseverance until the project was completed. Their attention to detail and 100% dedication to delivering the best result was evident at every step.

It’s rare to find companies like this these days, and I am deeply grateful for their hard work and support. I couldn’t be more thankful for all they’ve done.

seller_response.comment: Thank you for your wonderful feedback! Your professionalism and detailed instructions made my job effortless. Looking forward to future projects together!

reviews.comment:
⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ Fantastic Experience Working with Arju!

I had the pleasure of working with Arju on the development of www.Prepperz.dk, and I couldn’t be happier with the outcome!  

From start to finish, Arju was always available, ensuring that every detail of the project was handled professionally and efficiently. We had many meetings, and she was always well-prepared, patient, and open to feedback. Her attention to detail, technical expertise, and creative approach made the entire process smooth and enjoyable.  

Not only is she extremely skilled, but she is also incredibly kind and easy to work with. She listened carefully to my ideas and needs, providing great suggestions and solutions that made the website even better than I had imagined.  

If you're looking for a dedicated, talented, and friendly web developer, I highly recommend Arju! 5 stars without hesitation! ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

seller_response.comment: Thank you for your wonderful feedback! Your professionalism and detailed instructions made my job effortless. Looking forward to future projects together!

reviews.comment: Third Order in! And as per usual the product provided is just what I needed. Anyone uncertain about placing an order, take it from me, this one is legit! Couldn't be happier about the results.

seller_response.comment: Thank you for the kind words! You were a dream client, and I’m so glad we could achieve your vision. Looking forward to more successful projects together!

reviews.comment: I highly recommend his services to anyone looking to create a website or seeking assistance from a web developer. He did an outstanding job on my website! His attention to detail and bug-free delivery exceeded my expectations. He always went above and beyond with quick responses and clear communication. I wholeheartedly recommend working with him—absolute professionalism!

Working with Arju Akter on website development was a FANTASTIC experience! Her professionalism in delivering work that exceeded expectations, coupled with proactive communication and impressive responsiveness, truly stand out. I HIGHLY recommend her! 👏

seller_response.comment: Thank you for your wonderful feedback! Your professionalism and detailed instructions made my job effortless. Looking forward to future projects together!

reviews_snippet.comment: Arju Akter provided EXCELLENT service in website development, exceeding my expectations with her attention to detail and professionalism. Her cooperation, politeness, and quick responsiveness made the entire process smooth and enjoyable. 🙌 10/10—Arju is the person you're looking for! Once you arrive on her profile, look no further.
What a superstar this lady is... Fantastic response and delivery, and an amazing Communicator!!.... Thank you so much for delivering Both our projects on time and beyond expectations !!!!

This is the 2nd project that Arju has completed. Another outstanding achievement. Very satisfied with everything, communication, quality, responsiveness, and, of course, the WordPress website looks fantastic again.

Thank you, Arju, on to the 3rd project (already in progress).
Arju was just amazing. She knows all the techniques for finalizing the best project for clients. Very smooth and trouble free work. I'm impressed. Thanks a lot.
Arju built really complicated requirements in a swift manner. she is a top professional and will continue to work with her on future projects.
